Issue.creator: sambhavdutt
Issue.summary: Consistent TestRevokedCertificate fail in sdk-go unit tests due to expired certificate.
Issue.description: WARN Certificate error 'Certificate provided is not valid until later date' for cert '1' 17:18:48 fabsdk/fab 2019/03/14 21:18:48 UTC - membership.(*identityImpl).Validate -> ERRO Cert error Certificate provided is not valid until later date 17:18:48 fabsdk/fab 2019/03/14 21:18:48 UTC - membership.areCertDatesValid -> WARN Certificate error 'Certificate provided has expired' for cert '1' 17:18:48 fabsdk/fab 2019/03/14 21:18:48 UTC - membership.(*identityImpl).Validate -> ERRO Cert error Certificate provided has expired 17:18:48 fabsdk/fab 2019/03/14 21:18:48 UTC - membership.(*identityImpl).Validate -> ERRO failed to deserialize identity: MSP BadMSP is unknown 17:18:48 FAIL 17:18:48 coverage: 72.7% of statements 17:18:48 FAIL github.com/hyperledger/fabric-sdk-go/pkg/fab/channel/membership 0.043s {code} *Build Log* https://logs.hyperledger.org/production/vex-yul-hyp-jenkins-3/fabric-sdk-go-tests-merge-x86_64/1010/ >
